title: Zelle / P2P Payment Inquiry
description: A customer sent a Zelle payment to a friend, but the friend claims they never received it.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the specific Zelle transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the transaction in the customer's history.

tasks.description: Verify the recipient's contact information (phone number or email) used for the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the phone number with the customer, who realizes they entered one digit incorrectly.

tasks.description: Explain that Zelle payments are like cash and cannot be canceled if the recipient's contact is valid, and advise the customer on next steps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the bank cannot retrieve the funds and advises the customer to contact the unintended recipient if possible.
